title: Bug 6322 - All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322 - In the All types dialog, JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) etc.
OB: In the All types dialog, obfuscated classes (such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd') are displayed alongside other classes.
EB: Obfuscated classes should be displayed with less prominence or filtered out completely from the All types dialog.
SR:
Options to address this issue are: 
a) Sort lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter
b) Completely filter out obfuscated classes. I suggest Option a).
